mapper.insert:
INSERT ALL
INTO APPROVAL_LINE (APPROVAL_LEVEL, APPROVAL_NO, USER_NO, TYPE, STATUS, CONFIRM_STATUS, APPROVAL_DATE, APPROVAL_LINE_TYPE) VALUES (#{line.approvalLevel}, #{line.approvalNo}, #{line.userNo}, #{line.type}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, SYSDATE, #{line.approvalLineType})
SELECT 1 FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT al.APPROVAL_NO, al.USER_NO, al.TYPE, al.APPROVAL_LEVEL, a.APPROVAL_TITLE, a.APPROVAL_DATE, al.STATUS FROM APPROVAL_LINE al JOIN APPROVAL a ON al.APPROVAL_NO = a.APPROVAL_NO WHERE al.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND al.STATUS = 1 AND al.TYPE = '결재자'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APPROVAL_FAVORITE_LINE (LINE_NO, FAVORITE_NAME, USER_NO) VALUES (APPROVAL_FAVORITE_LINE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{favoriteName}, #{userNo})

INSERT ALL
INTO APPROVAL_ACTUAL_LINE ("LEVEL", LINE_NO, USER_NO, "TYPE", APPROVAL_TYPE) VALUES (#{line.level}, #{line.lineNo}, #{line.userNo}, #{line.type}, #{line.approvalType})
SELECT 1 FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT P.POSITION_NAME, D.DEPT_NAME, M.USER_NAME, L.FAVORITE_NAME, A.APPROVAL_TYPE, A."LEVEL", A.USER_NO FROM APPROVAL_ACTUAL_LINE A JOIN MEMBER M ON A.USER_NO = M.USER_NO JOIN DEPARTMENT D USING(DEPT_NO) JOIN POSITION P USING(POSITION_NO) JOIN ( SELECT LINE_NO, FAVORITE_NAME FROM APPROVAL_FAVORITE_LINE WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} ) L ON A.LINE_NO = L.LINE_NO ORDER BY L.FAVORITE_NAME, D.DEPT_NAME, M.USER_NAME
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM APPROVAL_FAVORITE_LINE WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND FAVORITE_NAME = #{favoriteName}
